iana.template_text:
(last updated 2010-11-16)

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.easykaraoke.cdgdownload

Required parameters : None

Optional parameters : None

Encoding considerations : 8bit

This media type may require encoding on transports not capable of
handling 8 bit text.

Security considerations : Content is relatively low value and is not 
   active or executable. No encryption is envisaged. It is 
   anticipated that the communication channel will be protected 
   through standard username/password or a token.

   No integrity services are required.

Interoperability considerations : The content is essentially a zip 
   file with windows media content with additional payload. It is 
   expected that only Easy Karaoke produced applications will use 
   this format.

Published specification : The content is essentially a zip file with 
   windows media content with additional payload.

 Applications which use this media :It is expected that only Easy 
   Karaoke produced applications will use this format.

Additional information :

   1. Magic number(s) : None
   2. File extension(s) : None or .zip
   3. Macintosh file type code : None
   4. Object Identifiers: None

The intended use is to allow an Easy Karaoke produced application to
automatically run and process the content on a client machine based on a link on a web page

Person to contact for further information :

   1. Name : Iain Downs
   2. Email : iain&easykaraoke.com

Intended usage : Common

   The type is expected to be used only by Easy Karaoke content and
   applications

Author/Change controller : Iain Downs iain&easykaraoke.com

(file created 2010-11-16)
